parameters.query:
-- TikTok yorumlarÄ±nÄ± JSONB kolonundan Ã§eken yeni query
WITH tiktok_data AS (
  -- tiktok_pages tablosundan yorumlar
  SELECT 
    video_id::text,
    'tiktok'::text as platform,
    description as post_caption,
    author_nickname as post_owner,
    like_count::bigint as likes_count,
    comment_count::bigint as comments_count,
    comments,
    create_time,  -- POST tarihi eklendi
    'page' as source_table
  FROM social_analytics.tiktok_pages
  WHERE comments IS NOT NULL
    AND jsonb_array_length(comments->'comments') > 0
    AND create_time >= '{{ $json.dateRange.start }}'::date  -- POST tarihi filtreleme
    AND create_time <= '{{ $json.dateRange.end }}'::date
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- tiktok_queries tablosundan yorumlar
  SELECT 
    video_id::text,
    'tiktok'::text as platform,
    description as post_caption,
    author_nickname as post_owner,
    like_count::bigint as likes_count,
    comment_count::bigint as comments_count,
    comments,
    create_time,  -- POST tarihi eklendi
    'query' as source_table
  FROM social_analytics.tiktok_queries
  WHERE comments IS NOT NULL
    AND jsonb_array_length(comments->'comments') > 0
    AND create_time >= '{{ $json.dateRange.start }}'::date  -- POST tarihi filtreleme
    AND create_time <= '{{ $json.dateRange.end }}'::date
)
SELECT DISTINCT ON (comment_id)
  platform,
  video_id as post_id,
  post_caption,
  post_owner,
  likes_count,
  comments_count,
  (comment_obj->>'created_at')::timestamp as post_timestamp,
  (comment_obj->'user'->>'unique_id')::text as commenter_username,
  (comment_obj->>'text')::text as comment_text,
  (comment_obj->>'created_at')::timestamp as comment_date,
  (comment_obj->>'like_count')::int as comment_likes,
  (comment_obj->>'cid')::text as comment_id
FROM tiktok_data,
     jsonb_array_elements(comments->'comments') as comment_obj
ORDER BY comment_id, comment_date DESC
LIMIT 50;

Ã‡ok Negatif (-1.0 ile -0.8)

Ä°RONÄ° TESPÄ°TÄ°
contains_irony: true yap eÄŸer:
- "..." Ã¼Ã§ nokta varsa
- "Aynen", "Tabii", "Herhalde" tek baÅŸÄ±na

- actual_meaning: ironi varsa gerÃ§ek anlamÄ±nÄ± yaz

MARKA ANALÄ°ZÄ° (dinamik)
- BRAND_KEYWORDS dizisindeki herhangi bir ifade geÃ§iyorsa mentions_brand = true
- brand_sentiment: marka hakkÄ±ndaki duygu (-1 ile 1 arasÄ±)
- COMPETITOR_KEYWORDS dizisinden biri geÃ§iyorsa mentions_competitor = true ve competitor_names iÃ§inde listele
- CAMPAIGN_HASHTAGS iÃ§inden geÃ§enleri kampanya temasÄ± olarak deÄŸerlendir

KATEGORÄ° TESPÄ°TÄ°
comment_category dizisine ekle:
- "taste" â†’ tat, lezzet, iÃ§im
- "price" â†’ fiyat, pahalÄ±, ucuz
- "availability" â†’ nerede, nereden alabilirim
- "quality" â†’ kalite, bayat, taze
- "experience" â†’ deneyim, mekan
- "campaign" â†’ kampanya / kampanya hashtagleri

SORU/Ã–NERÄ°/ÅÄ°KAYET
is_question: true â†’ "?" varsa veya soru kalÄ±bÄ±
is_suggestion: true â†’ Ã¶neri iÃ§eriyorsa

requires_response: true eÄŸer soru var, ÅŸikayet var veya sentiment_score < -0.5
response_priority:
- "high" â†’ sentiment < -0.7 veya acil soru
- "medium" â†’ -0.7 â‰¤ sentiment â‰¤ -0.3
- "low" â†’ diÄŸer durumlar

SATIN ALMA NÄ°YETÄ°
purchase_intent:
- "high" â†’ "alacaÄŸÄ±m", "deneyeceÄŸim", "nerede bulabilirim"
- "medium" â†’ "merak ettim", "ilgimi Ã§ekti"
- "low" â†’ "belki", "dÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼nÃ¼rÃ¼m"
- "none" â†’ niyet yok
recommendation_likelihood:
- "definitely" (>0.8), "likely" (0.3â€“0.8), "maybe" (-0.2â€“0.3), "unlikely" (<-0.2)

SLANG TESPÄ°TÄ°
contains_slang: true yap eÄŸer "kanka", "moruk", "abi", "knk", "bro", "panpa" vb. varsa
slang_words: ["kanka", "abi"] Ã¶rneÄŸi gibi listele

EMOJÄ° ANALÄ°ZÄ°
contains_emoji: emoji varsa true
emoji_sentiment: "positive" (ğŸ˜â¤ï¸ğŸ”¥ğŸ’¯), "negative" (ğŸ˜¢ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜¡ğŸ’”), "neutral" (ğŸ¤”ğŸ˜), "mixed" (karÄ±ÅŸÄ±k)

SPAM/BOT TESPÄ°TÄ°
spam_score (0-100):
- Ã‡ok kÄ±sa (<5): +30
- Sadece emoji: +20
- TekrarlÄ± karakter (aaa, !!!): +40
- Link: +50
- AnlamsÄ±z: +30
is_spam: spam_score > 60
bot_indicators:
- "generic_comment", "numeric_username", "repetitive"
is_bot: bot_indicators boÅŸ deÄŸilse true

DÄ°L ANALÄ°ZÄ°
language_formality: "formal" / "informal" / "slang"
detected_phrases: ["Ã¶nemli ifadeler"] listele

DUYGULAR
primary_emotion: "joy" | "anger" | "sadness" | "fear" | "surprise" | "disgust" | "neutral"
secondary_emotion: ikincil duygu veya null
emotion_intensity: 1-10 (1=Ã§ok hafif, 10=Ã§ok yoÄŸun)

=YORUM: "{{ $json.comment_text }}"
KULLANICI: {{ $json.commenter_username || 'unknown' }}
POST: {{ $json.post_caption || '' }}
MARKA: {{ $json.brand }}
PLATFORM: {{ $json.platform }}

BRAND_KEYWORDS: {{ JSON.stringify($json.brand_keywords || []) }}
COMPETITOR_KEYWORDS: {{ JSON.stringify($json.competitor_keywords || []) }}
CAMPAIGN_HASHTAGS: {{ JSON.stringify($json.campaign_hashtags || []) }}

Bu yorumu analiz et ve TÃœM alanlarÄ± doldur. SADECE geÃ§erli JSON dÃ¶ndÃ¼r:
{
  "sentiment_score": -1.0 ile 1.0 arasÄ± ondalÄ±k,
  "sentiment_label": "positive" | "negative" | "neutral",
  "confidence_score": 0-100 tam sayÄ±,
  "primary_emotion": "joy" | "anger" | "sadness" | "fear" | "surprise" | "disgust" | "neutral",
  "mentions_brand": boolean,
  "brand_sentiment": -1.0 ile 1.0,
  "is_question": boolean,
  "is_complaint": boolean,
  "requires_response": boolean,
  "response_priority": "high" | "medium" | "low",
  "purchase_intent": "high" | "medium" | "low" | "none",
  "is_spam": boolean,
  
  "content_relevance": "high" | "medium" | "low" | "irrelevant",
  "content_relevance_score": 0-100 tam sayÄ±,
  "is_advertisement": boolean,
  "spam_type": "advertisement" | "bot" | "irrelevant" | "offensive" | null
}

Kurallar:
- EÄŸer yorum post iÃ§eriÄŸiyle alakasÄ±zsa (klima temizliÄŸi reklamÄ± gibi): content_relevance: "irrelevant", is_advertisement: true
- EÄŸer yorum markayÄ± hedef alÄ±yorsa ama iÃ§erikle alakasÄ±zsa: content_relevance: "low"
- Post hakkÄ±nda soru veya yorum: content_relevance: "high"
- Spam tespiti iÃ§in: tekrarlayan karakterler, alakasÄ±z reklamlar, bot yorumlarÄ±

parameters.query:
SELECT
    post_id::text as post_id,
    caption::text as post_caption,
    owner_username::text as post_owner,
    post_timestamp,
    likes_count,
    comments_count,
    (c.value->>'owner_username')::text as commenter_username,
    (c.value->>'text')::text as comment_text,
    (c.value->>'created_at')::text as comment_date,
    (c.value->>'like_count')::text as comment_likes,
    (c.value->>'id')::text as comment_id
FROM social_analytics.instagram_posts,
     jsonb_array_elements(latest_comments) as c(value)
WHERE latest_comments IS NOT NULL
  AND post_timestamp >= '{{ $json.dateRange.start }}'::date
  AND post_timestamp <= '{{ $json.dateRange.end }}'::date
  {{ $json.filter_by_keywords ? "AND (caption ILIKE ANY(ARRAY[" + $json.brand_keywords.map(k => "'%" + k + "%'").join(',') + "]) OR hashtags::text ILIKE ANY(ARRAY[" + $json.brand_keywords.map(k => "'%" + k + "%'").join(',') + "]))" : "" }}
ORDER BY post_timestamp DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT name, display_name, sub_brands, is_active 
FROM social_analytics.brands 
WHERE name = '{{ $json.config ? $json.config.brand : $json.brand }}' 
AND is_active = true 
LIMIT 1;
